name: AUTOMATON (itch)
description:
IN BROWSER USING FULLSCREEN IS BETTER
(I suck at responsive UI :'( i'm sorry... )

AUTOMATON is a puzzle game where you have to program what will happen in the scene in order to keep the character alive and kill the enemy.

The thing is... you only have the right to use only one action from those available.

--- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- ---

AUTOMATON was made in 48hours during the GMTK{jam}

It was the first time for me to do a jam alone in such a short time and I'm quite proud of the result.

Hope you'll like it and have fun!
